raw_text:
No. CL-2024-0597
__________________
In the
Alabama Court of Civil Appeals
__________________
Brittany Michelle Gilliland,
Appellant,
vs.
Christopher Blaine McGregor,
Appellee.
MOTION FOR ENLARGEMENT OF TIME
Comes Now Appellant Brittany Michelle Gilliland, by and through
her counsel of record, Algert S. Agricola, Jr. and Barbara H. Agricola of
Agricola Law, LLC, and moves this Court to grant her a 14-day
enlargement of time within which to file her principal brief. The requested
enlargement of time is necessary because of counsel’s heavy caseload with
numerous filings due in the coming days. Currently, Appellant’s brief is
due to be filed on or before October 31, 2024. The requested enlargement
of time would make Appellant’s brief due to be filed on or before
November 14, 2024.
Wherefore premises considered, Appellant submits that her motion
for enlargement of time as set out hereinabove is due to be granted.
Respectfully submitted this 25th day of October, 2024.
/s Algert S. Agricola, Jr.
Algert S. Agricola, Jr.
Barbara H. Agricola
Barbara H. Agricola
Counsel for Appellant Brittany
Michelle Gilliland
OF COUNSEL:
Agricola Law, LLC
127 South 8th Street
Opelika, AL 36801
334.759.7557
al@agricolalaw.com
barbara@agricolalaw.com
2
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLIANCE
This document complies with the type-volume limitation set forth in
Ala. R. App. P. 32(b)(5), because, excluding the parts of the document
exempted by Ala. R. App. P. 32(c), this document contains 132 words
which is less than 2,000 words as required by Ala. R. App. P. 27(d).
This document complies with the typeface requirements and the
type-style requirements of Ala. R. App. P. 32(a)(7) because this document
has been prepared using WordPerfect in 14-point Century Schoolbook
font.
This 25th day of October, 2024.
/s Algert S. Agricola, Jr.
Algert S. Agricola, Jr. (SJIS AGR001)
/s Barbara H. Agricola
Barbara H. Agricola (SJIS AGR004)
Counsel for Appellant Brittany
Michelle Gilliland
OF COUNSEL:
AGRICOLA LAW, L.L.C.
127 South 8th Street
Opelika, AL 36801
(334) 759-7557 P
al@agricolalaw.com
barbara@agricolalaw.com
3
CERTIFICATE OF SERVICE
I hereby certify that on October 25, 2024, I electronically filed the
foregoing document with the Clerk of the Alabama Court of Civil Appeals
using the CTrack electronic filing system and I sent by electronic mail, a
true and correct copy to the following:
Nancy L. Eady
Morris Haynes
3500 Blue Lake Drive
Suite 200
Birmingham, AL 35243
Tom F. Young, Jr.
Morris Haynes
P.O. Box 1660
Alexander City, AL 35011
Counsel for Appellee
/s Algert S. Agricola, Jr.
OF COUNSEL
4
